data.rationale:
This module implements Munkres' solution to the classical
    Assignment Problem. I dont think, CPAN currently has any module,
    solving this problem. So I would like to share my version of Mukres'
    solution with the CPAN community.

    Note: I had earlier submitted a Namespace request for
    Algorithm::Munkre module. But I came to know later that, the
    person's name is Munkres, therefore I am submitting this new
    Namespace request for Algorithm::Munkres. Though the earlier request
    for Algorithm::Munkre is granted, I wont be using it.

    Sorry for all this confusion.
